TextAsset.value: H3R3 W3 4R3
W3LCOM3 TO CR1M1N4L JUST1C3 CLUB
1T’S RUN BY M3 SO YOU OBV1OUSLY M4D3 TH3 R1GHT CHO1C3!
Yeah, but you basically forced me into it!!!
D3T41LS D3T41LS
4NYW4Y TH4T’S BOR1NG L3T’S G3T TO TH3 GOOD STUFF
L1K3…
JUST1C3 >:]
1N TH1S CLUB JUST1C3 1S WH4T W3’R3 4LL 4BOUT
1F YOU C4N’T H4NDL3 TH4T…
TOO B4D FOR YOU!
NO M3RCY FOR W34KL1NGS OR CR1M1N4LS!
Are you saying you’ll…
Actually KILL me?!
H3H3H3 OF COURS3 NOT
1’M JUST PL4Y1NG 4ROUND
DONT B3 SUCH 4 ST1CK 1N TH3 MUD!
1T’S JUST
Y’KNOW
FL4VOR T3XT TO M4K3 1T F33L MOR3 4UTH3NT1C
TH1S CLUB 1S JUST 4 PL4C3 TO GOOF 4ROUND 4ND H4V3 FUN >:P
...1N TH3 N4M3 OF JUST1C3 OF COURS3!
Oh… okay.
Well, that’s a relief.
(I still don’t feel like I can let my guard down around her, though.)
H3H3H3H3! YOU’R3 FUN
…Eh heh… Yeah…
But you know, if you’re really that interested in “justice”...
You could’ve just joined Meowkie on the Hall Monitor squad!
Y34H TH3 C4T S33MS PR3TTY COOL
SH3 K1ND4 R3M1NDS M3 OF 4N OLD FR13ND OF M1NE
BUT NO
1 H4V3 4 D1FF3R3NT BR4ND OF JUST1C3 >:]
(What does THAT mean…)
SO ${slot:playerName}
L3T’S T4LK 4BOUT YOU
(Eep! She’s awfully close…
I can see myself reflected in those spooky red glasses…)
HOW 4BOUT YOUR CR1M1N4L P4ST?
YOU D1DN’T R34LLY TH1NK YOU COULD G3T 4W4Y W1TH 1T D1D YOU
OR M4YB3 YOU’R3 TH3 OV3RCONF1D3NT TYP3
SO SUR3 TH3Y C4N G3T 4W4Y W1TH 4NYTH1NG…
N3V3R NOT1C1NG TH4T JUST1C3 1S R1GHT ON TH31R H33LS!
What?! No, no!
It was an accident! Well, sort of…
I certainly didn’t mean for any of it to happen, at least.
When I rolled up the whole school…
4H4! YOU 4DM1T 1T!
YOU ROLL3D UP TH3 SCHOOL
COLL3CT1NG 3V3RY S1NGL3 D3L1C1OUS COLOR 4ND SH4D3
4ND ROLL1NG TH3M 4LL UP 1NTO 4 B1G R41NBOW B4LL
SP4RKL1NG W1TH COLOR 4ND HUG3 3NOUGH FOR 3V3RYON3 TO G3T 4 GOOD WH1FF!
4 G14NT R41NBOW-SPR1NKL3 DONUT TR34T…
SO D3C4D3NT! 1T 4LMOST F33LS WRONG TO T4LK 4BOUT IT
H3H3H3H3
That… went to a weird place.
DON’T D3NY 1T!
MY DR4GON MOM T4UGHT M3 TO 3XP3R13NC3 TH3 WORLD THROUGH SC3NT 4ND T4ST3
1 C4N SM3LL R1GHT THROUGH YOUR D3C3PT1ON!!!
I-I’m not denying it!!
I did it. It was a terrible mistake.
I’ll definitely never try anything like that again!
(Jeez, is this a club, or an interrogation?! I didn’t sign up for this!)
Anyway… “dragon mom”?
TH4T’S NOT 1MPORT4NT R1GHT NOW
I think name dropping your “dragon mom” definitely warrants further-
1 S41D TH4T’S NOT 1MPORT4NT R1GHT NOW!!!
Okay okay, geez.
Are all trolls as scary as you?!
H3H3! TH3Y W1SH >:]
Haha! Of course they do.
(Say what you will about Terezi… she’s definitely confident.)
SO YOU S4Y YOU W1LL N3V3R ROLL UP YOUR B1G R41NBOW DONUT 4G41N…
H4! 4 L1K3LY STORY!!!
By “rainbow donut”, you mean my katamari, right?
SHUT UP
Yes ma’am.
YOUR WORDS 4R3 HOLLOW, COTTON C4NDY
FULL OF HOL3S… JUST L1K3 YOUR B1G D3L1C1OUS DONUT!
YOU S4Y 1T’S B3H1ND YOU BUT 1 B3T YOU’R3 JUST 1TCH1NG TO DO 1T 4G41N
BR34K 1T OUT OF TH3 W34PONS V4ULT 4ND GO CR4ZY ON3 MOR3 T1M3
ROLL1NG UP 4LL THOS3 MOUTHW4T3R1NG COLORS 1NTO 4 G14NT…
1RR3S1ST4BL3…
MOUNT41N OF FL4VOR…
1’M S4L1V4T1NG JUST TH1NK1NG 4BOUT 1T
It… kinda sounds like you actually WANT me to do it.
H3H3H3 NOW WH3R3 WOULD YOU G3T TH4T 1D34
B-but… but this is the Criminal Justice club!
Why would you suggest I do something so CLEARLY against the rules?!
DON’T T4K3 TH1NGS SO L1T3R4LLY COTTON C4NDY
DON’T YOU KNOW FL1RT1NG WH3N YOU S33 1T?
1 DO 4ND 1 C4N’T 3V3N S33!
(How often is she gonna play that card?!)
CUT3 G1RLS L1K3 TO M3SS W1TH COOLK1DS L1K3 YOU
1T G3TS TH3M 4LL FLUST3R3D WH1CH 1S PR3TTY CUT3 <3
UNFORTUN4T3LY YOU’R3 4LMOST TOO 34SY OF 4 T4RG3T
YOU M3LT F4ST3R TH4N 4 HOOFB34ST 1N 4N 4DH3S1V3 F4CTORY
WH1CH 1S TOO B4D B3C4US3 1 LOV3 TH3 THR1LL OF TH3 CH4S3 >:P
(I have… a lot… of mixed feelings...about...this converstion.)
Listen, Terezi… I don’t know what you’ve heard, or smelled, or what…
But I seriously promise I won’t do my katamari stuff again! Okay?!
UGGGGHHH! YOU’R3 SO BOR1NG!!!
JUST L1K3 MY OLD P4RTN3R
YOU R3M1ND M3 OF H1M 1N 4 LOT OF W4YS…
H3 THOUGHT H3 W4S TH3 L34D3R, TH3 VO1C3 OF R34SON
OBV1OUSLY TH4T W4S JUST WH4T 1 4LLOW3D H1M TO TH1NK >:P
ST1LL 3V3N THOUGH H3 W4S SO STUFFY...
1 K1ND4 M1SS H1M SOM3T1M3S
(Old partner?!
Does she mean, like, an ex?!
Wait a minute! Come to think of it-)
W-wait… are you implying we’re already “partners”?!
WHO C4R3S
H3’S LONG GON3 NOW 4NYW4Y…
B3S1D3S HOW COULD 4N 4G3NT OF JUST1C3 L1K3 M3 P4RTN3R UP W1TH 4 D3T3ST4BL3 CR1M1N4L L1K3 YOU? >:]
Wait, but…
Aren’t you a “criminal” too?
We met in detention, after all.
NOT TH3 S4M3
1 W4S 4 POL1T1C4L PR1SON3R
Whaaat?!
Y34H TH3Y GOT M3 ON CH4RG3S OF V4ND4L1SM
SOOOOOOOO R1D1CULOUS!
CH4LK W4SH3S R1GHT OFF 4NYW4Y
4SP3C14LLY WH3N YOU US3 YOUR OWN TONGU3 >:P
(How does that… make her… a “political prisoner”...
You know what, no. I’m not touching any part of that statement with a ten foot pole.)
4NYW4Y W3’R3 G3TT1NG OFF TOP1C
TH3 PO1NT 1S
1M DY1NG TO S33 TH4T R41NBOW DONUT TR34T OF YOURS!
JUST DYYYYY1NG!
SO HURRY UP 4ND BR34K YOUR B1G COLOR-B4LL TH1NGY FR33 4ND DO 1T 4G41N!
1T W4S TOO D3L1CIOUS TO R3S1ST…
4ND 1 N3V3R GOT 4 CH4NC3 TO T4ST3 1T MYS3LF!
S-some “Criminal Justice” club this is!
You keep encouraging me to break the rules!
4W C’MON COTTON C4NDY
DO 1T FOR M3??
1 KNOW YOU DON’T W4NT TO S33 4 B34UT1FUL TROLL G1RL S4D >:]
You have literally never stopped grinning the entire time I’ve known you.
S3R1OUSLY THOUGH
1’M NOT M3SS1NG W1TH YOU TH1S T1M3
1’D R34LLY L1K3 TO S33 1T 4G41N…
SO TH1NK 4BOUT 1T, OK4Y?
TH4T’S 1T! JUST1C3 CLUB 1S OV3R
OUT OUT OUT!
(Whaa? That was fast! She’s shoving me right out the door!)
THINK 1T OV3R, OK4Y COTTON C4NDY?
(OH MY GOD NOW SHE'S LICKING ME RIGHT ON THE FACE WHAT DO I DO WHAT DO I DO?!?!)
SM3LL YOU L4T3R <3
She slammed the door right in my face…
Man, what a confusing day.
Why does the leader of the Criminal Justice Club want me to break rules so bad?
She says it's just for the colors she loves…
She does seem to go nuts for that stuff.
And… of course I’d love to make her happy, but…
Can I trust her? She’s not exactly giving me a whole lot of reasons to.
And what’s the deal with that “old partner” anyway?!
...Not that I’m jealous or anything…
Sigh… I can’t believe she actually licked me.
...Omigosh!!!
Does that mean we’re married in Troll World?!)
